dict.acceptation: 明亮地；明净地；明确地；显然地；

sent.orig: That is clearly irrational, yet that is clearly a force that drives nature.
sent.trans: 这显然不合乎常理，但又显然是一股推动自然的力量。

sent.orig: Virginia Woolf: If I were thinking clearly? If I were thinking clearly?
sent.trans: 弗吉尼亚·沃尔芙：如果我能想清楚？如果我能想清楚？

sent.orig: Clearly, it was a 10, Shawn! Clearly!
sent.trans: 肖恩，你想什么呢？那绝对是应该得10分啊！

sent.orig: The dust devil column is clearly defined and is clearly bent in the down wind direction.
sent.trans: 旋风的柱体可以被清晰的辨认出，并明显的朝顺风的方向弯曲。

sent.orig: Clearly they recognise the days of the dollar as the dominant global currency are numbered.
sent.trans: 他们显然认识到美元作为全球主导货币的日子无多了。
